mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_coupon (`name`, description, discount_type, discount, `condition`, use_start_time, use_end_time, create_num, send_num, use_num, `enable`) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{condition,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{useStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{useEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sendNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{useNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update t_coupon set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount_type = #{discountType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, `condition` = #{condition,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, use_start_time = #{useStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, use_end_time = #{useEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_num = #{createNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, send_num = #{sendNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, use_num = #{useNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `enable` = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, description, discount_type, discount, `condition`, use_start_time, use_end_time, create_num, send_num, use_num, `enable` from t_coupon where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, `name`, description, discount_type, discount, `condition`, use_start_time, use_end_time, create_num, send_num, use_num, `enable` from t_coupon
